metadata.Title: CVE-2021-24115 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In Botan before 2.17.3, constant-time computations are not used for certaindecoding and encoding operations (base32, base58, base64, and hex).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-24115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

botan - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
libbotan-2-17 - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
python3-botan - 2.17.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: botan package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.17.3+dfsg-1').
